title: 92/257/EEC: Commission Decision of 21 April 1992 amending Decision 87/119/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Brazil approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 21 April 1992  amending Decision 87/119/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Brazil approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community  (92/257/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 87/119/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 April 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28. (2) OJ No L 356, 24. 12. 1991, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 49, 18. 2. 1987, p. 37. (4) OJ No L 9, 13. 1. 1988, p. 14.
